title: FS: T206 Black Cap Matty Clipped Corner Otherwise NM/MT STUNNING
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Black Cap Matty Clipped Corner Otherwise NM/MT STUNNING
posts.post_content:
Colors on this Matty are breathtaking. This card would have a chance to be NM/MT 8 if it had four corners. Instead of the five that it has. The scan is nice but doesn't do the brilliant colors justice. Looks pack fresh.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains128/matty_zpsbzgzwpvc.jpeg[/IMG]

Asking just SOLD delivered.

Tom C
